summary: WHILE DRIVING, THE CONSUMER HEARD A LOUD NOISE COMING FROM UNDERNEATH THE VEHICLE.  THE DRIVER WAS ABLE TO MAINTAIN CONTROL OF THE VEHICLE AND DROVE IT HOME.  THE DRIVER NOTICED THAT THE GAS TANK WAS LEAKING FLUID.  THE DRIVER WILL CONTACTED THE DEALER IN THE NEAR FUTURE.  PLEASE PROVIDE FURTHER DETAILS.  *JB
WHILE TRAVELING ON THE HIGHWAY THE MOTORHOME HAD VIBRATION COMING FROM UNDERNEATH.  *AK

WHEN WE FIRST PICKED IT UP WE QUESTIONED THE STEERING,  THEY STATED IT TOOK TIME TO GET USE TO IT.  WE TRAVELED 5000 MILES WITH THE MOTOR HOME WANDERING AND PULLING TO THE OTHER SIDE OF THE ROAD MY HUSBAND HAD TO HANG ON TO WITH BOTH HANDS TO CONTROL IT.   WHEN WE ARRIVED HOME FROM OUR VACATION ON 3/21/2000 WE REPORTED IT TO THE DEALER HE WANTED US TO ADD ON STEERING CONTROLS.  IT WAS STATED THAT WORKHORSE THE MANUFACURER OF THE VEHICLE THAT IT HAD TO BE TAKEN INTO AN AUTHORIZED DEALER, WHICH WE DID.  IT HAS BEEN UNDER REPAIR SINCE 4/13/2000 WITH NOTHING BEING DONE AND WITH NO SATISFACTION FROM THE MANUFACTURE.  THE ;MECHANIC EVEN STATED THAT THERE WAS DEFINITELY SOMETHING WRONG.  WE HAVE BEEN WAITING FOR THEM TO CONTACT US SINCE 5/10 AND THEY HAVE NOT.  *AK
